#type: node
#context: sop
#internal: export
#namespace: vhacd
#icon: /nodes/sop/SOP_VHACD.png

#tags: vhacd

= Export (v-hacd) =

""" Export convex hulls generated by V-HACD decomposition """

Export generated convex hulls by using ((hull_id)) or ((bundle_id)) attribute.

@parameters

== Filter ==

Filter Mode:
	#id: filtermode
    Specify how to filter geometry before saving it to disk.
	
== Main ==
	
Output Path:
    #id: outputpath
    Path where convex hulls will be stored.
	
Save To Disk:
    #id: savetodisk
    Perform saving to disk operation.	
	
Create JSON Config:
    #id: createjsonconfig
    Create JSON configuration file that stores names of all convex hulls for specified model.
	
Append ATT Name:
    #id: appendattributenametopath
    Append attribute name, which is used to ouput geometry by, to each output file name.
	
Flip Normals:
    #id: flipnormals
    Flip normals of saved geometry.
	
== Additional ==

[Include:parameters--description#adddescription]
[Include:parameters--description#cleandescription]
[Include:parameters--description#descriptionmessage]

@related
- [Node:sop/vhacd--setup]
- [Node:sop/vhacd--generate]
- [Node:sop/vhacd--scout]
- [Node:sop/vhacd--merge]
- [Node:sop/vhacd--debug]
- [Node:sop/vhacd--transform]
- [Node:sop/vhacd--delete]
